mdRecord.dcterms:title: Drama Festival: Aug 26 Thru Sept 27
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the Aug 26- Sep 27 Drama Festival. Productions include: Blithe Spirit, Aug 26 | My Sister Eileen, Aug 27 | State of the Union, Aug 28 | Wings Over Europe, Aug 29 | My Sister Eileen, Aug 30 | State of the Union, Aug 31 | The Women, Sep 2 | Much Ado About Nothing, Sep 3 | Blithe Spirit, Sep 4 | Virginia Overture, Sep 5 | Three Men on a Horse, Sep 5 | Arms And the Man, Sep 6 | Much Ado About Nothing, Sep 7.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
